channel.title: Need help with some errors
channel.description:
can someone help me fix these plzzzzzz
client.java:116: cannot find symbol symbol : variable vengeance location: class client if (IsAttacking == true && vengeance == true) { ^ client.java:140: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Vengeance location: class client Vengeance = false; ^ client.java:150: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Vengeance location: class client if (IsAttackingNPC == true && Vengeance == true) { ^ client.java:170: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Vengeance location: class client Vengeance = false; ^ client.java:181: cannot find symbol symbol : variable CanVen location: class client if (playerLevel[6] >= 94 && CanVen == true) ^ client.java:183: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Vengeance location: class client if (Vengeance == true) ^ client.java:187: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Vengeance location: class client else if (Vengeance != true) ^ client.java:193: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Vengeance location: class client Vengeance = true; ^ client.java:194: cannot find symbol symbol : variable VengeanceTimer location: class client VengeanceTimer = 700; ^ client.java:195: cannot find symbol symbol : variable VenTimer location: class client VenTimer = 800; ^ client.java:21371: cannot find symbol symbol : variable vengtimer location: class client vengtimer = 20; ^ client.java:21372: cannot find symbol symbol : variable waittimer location: class client waittimer = 20; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 12 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Need help with some errors
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Rofl they did not forget brackets. Can you read? Its Cannot Find Symbol, not illegal start of expression.

The problem is didnâ€™t declare the variables. Try adding this above

public class client extends Player implements Runnable
public boolean vengeance = false;
public boolean Vengeance = false;
public int VengeanceTimer = 0;
public int VenTimer = 0;
public int vengtimer = 0;
public int waittimer = 0;

Read full topic
